divs: sighting detailsi observed a large retangular object stationary in the night sky the object was very bright. it appeared to be a docking platform. there were object's approaching from both directions. they would stop momentarily then depart this platform. i told my teacher about this event the next day. she replied," billy you observed something very special." my uncle marvin morris observed an object land in a field just outside of rutland,ohio at about the same time frame. my brother gene stephenson informed me that he along with other residence of middleport, ohio obserevd a traingle shape object in the night sky and chased after it in their cars. i've had nightmares about being chase by ufo's and i couldn't hide. i'm a retired philadelphia police detective and a retired intelligence specialist chief petty officer. thank you' [cms\tg\pid]
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Middleport
There were no other sightings in Middleport on or around June 30th 1947
Summary: BRIGHT OBJECTS IN THE SKY, ONE RETANGULAR
